Job Title: Market Research Intern, EV Charging Vertical Market, Nashville, TN

Location: Nashville, TN

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Marketing, Research

Description:
SitelogIQ is a rapidly growing energy and facility services company. We provide planning, design, and management solutions for organizations who want to create efficient and sustainable environments that are healthier and safer for their occupants.Our Market Research Intern will assist us with conducting market research and analysis for our EV Charging vertical market. This role reports directly to the Senior Product Offering Manager and works closely with the sales team to provide support. A successful candidate can expect to gain practical experience in marketing, with a heavy focus on market research in a dynamic and growing industry.ResponsibilitiesConduct market research to identify key mechanisms, technologies, and partners related to fleet electrification, EV charging financing, and third-party ownership options.Map the area of expertise by market segment and verticals for each vendor. Evaluate their experience and capabilities in detail.Identify the most promising market segments and customer profiles for SitelogIQ's fleet electrification offering.Analyze contracts and summarize key contract terms for each partner/vendor.Create financial models to help with prioritization and estimates at the customer portfolio level.Develop brochures, case studies, and white papers to support the sales team in leveraging these options.Produce a report summarizing the lessons learned from the research.Assist with other market research projects as needed. QualificationsCurrently pursuing, or recently completed, a Bachelor's or Master's degree in Marketing or a related field.Strong research and analytical skills.Attention to detail and ability to work independently.Excellent written and verbal communication skills.Proficiency in Microsoft Office, particularly Excel and PowerPoint.Familiarity with market research tools and techniques is a plus.No agencies pleaseBenefitsWe offer a highly competitive salary, and comprehensive benefits, including:Medical, dental, and vision insuranceDisability and life insurance401KFlex time off and 12 paid holidaysTuition reimbursementOpportunities to drive our DE&I efforts and join our affinity groups, Veterans and Allies Leadership Organization (VALOR) or Women Inspiring & Strengthening Everyone (WISE)Opportunities to give back to our local communities through organized eventsMore About SitelogIQAt SitelogIQ, we’re focused on creating a great environment for our team first so that it is more energizing and rewarding to focus on creating a great customer experience. That’s what we call a win-win.We partner with clients in K-12, higher ed, government, healthcare, multifamily housing, and industry to optimize energy efficiencies, improve indoor air quality, remodel and build buildings, and improve the customer experience. Our mission is to “Make Buildings Better.” With offices across the country, it’s rewarding to make a difference in the communities where our teammates live and work.SitelogIQ is an Equal Opportunity Employer and participates in E-Verify.BenefitsWe offer a highly competitive salary, and comprehensive benefits, including:Medical, dental, and vision insuranceDisability and life insurance401KFlex time off12 paid holidaysTuition reimbursementOpportunities to drive our DE&I efforts by joining our affinity groups, Veterans and Allies Leadership Organization or Women Inspiring & Strengthening EveryoneOpportunities to give back to our local communities through organized events or fundraisersMore About SitelogIQAt SitelogIQ, we’re focused on creating a great environment for our team first so that it is more energizing and rewarding to focus on creating a great customer experience. That’s what we call a win-win.We partner with clients in K-12, higher ed, government, healthcare, multifamily housing, and industry to optimize energy efficiency, improve indoor air quality, address lighting, and improve the customer experience. With offices across the country, it’s rewarding to make a difference in the communities where our teammates live and work.SitelogIQ is an Equal Opportunity Employer and participates in E-Verify.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
